translations: 有雾的，雾气茫茫的；迷糊的，朦胧的；模糊的，糊涂的

sentences.sentence: Get away from the foggy morning.
No area was spared or unaffected, from the foggy northern coast to the Sierra Nevada Mountains.
sentences.translation: 从雾蒙蒙的北部海岸到内华达山脉，没有一个地区幸免或不受影响。

sentences.sentence: They can change their minds 200 times, but having only a foggy view of the future is of little good.
sentences.translation: 他们可以200次改变主意，但对未来只有模糊的想法是不好的。
